text: Hello, have you ever heard of the Save the Children charity?
yes i have heard of it, it is very good what they are doing. They ar doing the work of god .
Would you be willing to donate some or all of your task payment to them today to help the children?
of course i would, its the least i could do to help the children in the world.
You can donate anything from $0 to all of your payment. How much would you be willing to donate today?
i would be willing to donate 0.2 $ , i know it is not what others aspect me to give.
Every little bit help. Did you know that they are already getting set up to help the children and families in Hawaii with Hurricane Lane heading their way.
i didnt know till now , you verified what i heard , they are making something beautiful for the people of Hawaii .
Yes, they are. And I love how they help all children of the world. A lot of times charities don't give to those that are hurting right here in America. And Save the Children does.
this is a perfect charity organization , they do all kind of things to help others around the world.
Yes, and our children need help they are our future without them we are nothing.
you personalty are willing to donate today?
Yes, I plan to much your donation of $0.20.
very good, do you think they may just get the money and dont help no one?
The research team will collect it and send it to Save the Children.
so you have completely trust your money would go where you intend to?
I know it is hard to trust people now a days, but think of it this way. You are donating money you don't even have yet so it is not like you are missing something.
i understand you , just asking, have you ever heard that some of this kind of charities steal the money? some got to prison.
Yes, I have heard that. And it is a shame
i dont like it either but we cant do nothing about it.
